name: An Ordinary Adventure+ [DEMO]
description:
"SomeGuy, I respect you," John spoke, "but please tell me, what is going on?" Play the original game here! ABOUT?

Back in 2020, An Ordinary Adventure was published on Scratch, and a year later (2021) it was brought to Newgrounds. And not a year after the first game was brought to Newgrounds, I, midgetsausage, decided to overhaul the game... again.

Featuring whole new cutscenes, whole new backgrounds, and some other cool changes while still retaining the same gameplay and, roughly, the same story. As always, we hope you enjoy the changes as much as we enjoyed making them!

‎ ‎ 

NOTES?

Obviously, you know, you can't play this on mobile; and as mentioned in the title and as you start the game, THIS IS A DEMO! 

If you have any suggestions, complaints, bugs/glitches you found, yada yada, please let us know. Yes, we read everything you want us to read.
